Sentence.string: When we first met, you looked very angry after Marcus Blayton. Did he owe you some money ?
Uh… It’s possible, yes. I don’t count every penny, you know.
Mr. Hurtley, I think that you don’t realise how serious the situation is. It’s a murder case. I suggest you to tell me the truth if you don’t want to get into troubles with Scotland Yard.
Ok, it’s true that this guy started to have a huge debt. I kindly reminded him to pay me, maybe I was a bit heavy but it was just to scare him, nothing more.
